coreSkills.title: Understanding and Managing Emotions
coreSkills.description: Listening to your internal weather report!

coreSkills.title: Building Emotional Regulation
coreSkills.description: Learning to manage those big feelings

coreSkills.title: Being Mindful
coreSkills.description: Hitting the pause button on chaos and observing without judgment

coreSkills.title: Building Distress Tolerance
coreSkills.description: Not freaking out when things get tough

assumptions.title: People are doing the best they can
assumptions.description: Everyone is trying their hardest with the resources and skills they have at the moment.

assumptions.title: People want to improve
assumptions.description: Individuals seeking DBT are motivated to change and build a better life.

assumptions.title: People need to do better, try harder, and be more motivated
assumptions.description: While acknowledging best efforts, change requires continuous effort and increased motivation.

assumptions.title: You may not have caused all problems, but you solve them
assumptions.description: Personal responsibility for finding solutions, regardless of problem origins.

assumptions.title: Dysregulated lives are not easily bearable
assumptions.description: Acknowledges the real suffering experienced by individuals with these challenges.

assumptions.title: Learn new behaviors in all contexts
assumptions.description: Effective change involves applying new skills across various situations.

assumptions.title: All behaviors are caused
assumptions.description: Behaviors arise from complex factors â€“ DBT seeks to understand those causes.

assumptions.title: People cannot fail in DBT
assumptions.description: DBT focuses on learning and progress, not success or failure.
